PLAYER.NOT_AVAILABLE: The program is not yet available for viewing. Please try again later.
PLAYER.DENIED: This program cannot be played from your current location. Access has been restricted by the administrator.
PLAYER.NOT_FOUND: This program cannot be found. Probably it was deleted. Try to re-login  or contact your system administrator.
PLAYER.NOT_AUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to view this video. Try to re-login  or contact your system administrator.
PLAYER.NO_FLASH: This video cannot currently be played in this browser. Please install the Adobe Flash Player. You may need to restart the browser after installation completes.
